info.name: Yammer - groups icons
info.description:
Add a group icon to the right of the group in left column.
This CSS has to be customised to match your own icon images and groups.
info.additionalInfo:
"How To" included in the CSS

Versions

3.05 added FDMS+ icon
3.04 added ECFIN modelling icon
3.03 added Macrobond icon
3.02 increased margin-left of .yj-global-sidebar--group-item
3.01 added Ameco icon
3.00 class yj-global-sidebar--item--link instead of yj-nav-menu--group-item-link
2.10 added a few icons for EU Open Data Portal and IT & Security group
2.09 added EPKit icon
2.08 added a Sharepoint icon (data:uri)
2.07 added Newcomers icon
2.06 added icon Wikis
2.05 added icons
2.04 added icons
2.03 increased padding-left from 22 to 24px (left column)
2.02 increased padding-left from 16 to 22px (left column)
2.01 Some icons added
2.00 Selector had changed to "span[title="All Company group"] .yj-nav-menu--group-item-link"
1.06 Fixed color (DarkRed) of selected group in left menu column
1.05 Some icons added
1.04 One icon added
1.03 Icons left to labels, counters red and bold
1.02 Some icons added
1.01 Some icons added
1.00 First
